alert.note: Alert for Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264 (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 10 at 5:33PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...An area of showers producing strong wind gusts will impact areas form near Winslow to near Sanders along I-40 through 730 PM MDT/630 PM MST/... At 627 PM MDT/527 PM MST/, Doppler radar was tracking an area of showers producing strong wind gusts from Winslow to Sanders, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Winslow, Holbrook, Cornfields Chapter House, Dilkon, Joseph City, Klagetoh, Pine Springs, Window Rock, Hubbell Trading Post National Historic Site, White Cone, Wide Ruins, Sun Valley, Petrified Forest National Park, Indian Wells, Chambers, Greasewood Springs, Castle Butte, Sanders, Seba Dalkai and Sunrise Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
